excerpt.rendered:
Pure C Facial Serum

Alila Living’s Pure C Facial Serum is a light-yet-rich blend of highly essential nutrients that helps your skin stay healthier longer. This Vitamin-C packed serum also contains aloe-vera juice, virgin coconut oil, jojoba bean oil and evening primrose oils creating a luxurious foundation of rich essential fatty acids that help “plump up” the fine lines that cause wrinkles. Orange peel extract, French Geranium and fragrant wildflower honey offer incredible antioxidant power in this delightful masterpiece that your skin will simply love.

You can buy this product here: Shopalila
